Goa is one of the most favourite tourist places among the travelers of all over the world. Not only the tourists but even the cine artists (cine Industry) are attracted by the beauty of Goa. Simultaneously, the hotels – all categories, accommodation facilities, the satisfactory services provided by the people and hospitality by the local people, invite people to visit Goa.

MIRAMAR BEACH – This is one of the beautiful beaches of Goa. It is just 3 km away from Panjim. Goa Marriott Resort, a five star hotel is near Miramar Beach. It is situated overlooking Aguada Bay. The rooms of this hotel are very spacious and well decorated. All the modern amenities are provided here. The required facilities are provided here so that the tourists do not face any type of problem and can enjoy the beauty of Goa. 

THE LEELA KEMPINSKI GOA – This is another five star hotel, located at the walking distance from the Cavelossim beach. It is a luxurious hotel with all luxurious facilities. 

MAPPLE VIVA GOA – This hotel is located in Calangute, North Goa. It is one km. away from Calangute beach. It is three star hotel. 
Near Baga Beach, there are few three star hotels viz., Resorte Marinha Dourada, Marquis Beach Resort, Mello Rosa Resort etc. These are quite famous 3 start hotels. 
PRAIHNA BEACH RESORT is another three star Beach resort, set in a tranquil palm grove on the beach fronts. 
HOTEL Montego Bay BEACH village lies across the Chapora River and the Fort, along the North Goa Coastline on a beautiful beach called Morjim. This is a three star Hotel. 
Baywatch Resort and Bollywood Sea Queen Beach Resort are near Colva Beach and are available at affordable/budget rates. These Hotels are also quite famous. This beach with silver sand is one of the most popular beaches of the tourists.

It is a two star hotel and comparatively quite cheap. Beira Mar Alfran Resort is on Uttorda beach. It is a two star hotel. Another two star hotel on this beach is Palolem Beach Resort.
